snippet.title: Summerhill - Official Teaser Trailer | Day of the Devs 2023
snippet.description: Check out the reveal trailer for Summer, an upcoming story-driven puzzle adventure game from Land & Sea, the creators of Alto’s Adventure and Alto’s Odyssey. In Summerhill, you play as a young shepherd and their dog. Work together to rescue your sheep and delve into the mysterious, long-forgotten world that lies beyond the borders of home.
